title: Biggest NBA Weekend Of The Year
description:
Jalen & Jacoby preview tonight’s play-in games. What do the Atlanta Hawks need to do in order to win on the road in Cleveland? Can Trae Young lead them to victory? And over in the west it’s the New Orleans Pelicans vs the Los Angeles Clippers. Clippers are favorites to win, but is that who the guys are picking? Listen to find out. Also, we continue to preview this weekend’s games. All eyes will be on the Brooklyn Nets vs the Boston Celtics. Who do the guys think will be the X-factor for the series. And, Nikola Jokic doesn’t know where his 2021 MVP Trophy is. Soft Move or Boss Move?  All this and more… 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
itunes:subtitle: J&J: Previewing The Biggest NBA Weekend Of The Year
